function.name: get_component_map

function.description: Read the current system configuration from database, including all model assignments (AGENT_MODEL, ROUTER_MODEL, etc.). Use to answer questions about models, inventory all LLMs, or show system configuration. Secrets are masked. Database is source of truth.
